GSP29nvtp1_2u:4: sa ca parārtho 'pi pṛcchopakramapratiyoginyekavaktṛke vicāre vivicya
GSP29nvtp1_2u:7: nyāyasya dūṣaṇopakramapratiyoginī tu nānāpravaktṛke kathānāmni kriyāvyatihāre pravartyaṃ vivecanīyaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_2u:10: dvitīyāhnikārthastu pravartanavivecana upālambhaparapadārthalakṣaṇamiti yukta idānīṃ tasyārambhaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_2u:11: tatrāpi pravartyavivecanīyadvāreṇa pravṛttiprakāratvācca kathāyāḥ prathamaṃ kathāprakaraṇamārabhyate
GSP29nvtp1_2u:12: yadyapi ca kathā sākṣāt noddiṣṭā, tathāpyasaṃgatibhitā bhāṣyakāraḥ tadupasaṃgraheṇaiva vādādīn vibhajate /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:13: anyathā hi vādādilakṣaṇasya pūrvāparaprakaraṇāpraveśāt āhnikāpraveśe śāstrabahirbhāvaprasaṅgaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_2u:14: atha sūtrakṛtaiva kathā kathaṃ sākṣāt noddiṣṭa, vivakṣitaphale ekānekatvānurodhena sāmānyaviśeṣayoryathāyathamuddeśāt? tad yathā caturṣu
GSP29nvtp1_2u:15: pramaiva vivakṣitaṃ phalamiti pramāṇatvena, saiva dvādaśaviṣayiṇī vivakṣiteti prameyatvena, hānameva vivakṣitamiti sukhaṃ duḥkhatvena /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:16: iha tu tattvanirṇayaḥ, jalpe svaśaktiparāśaktikhyāpanam, vitaṇḍāyāṃ parāśaktimātraprakhyāpanaṃ ca phalāni vivakṣitāni /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:17: tāni ca na kathāmātrasādhyānīti viśeṣata evoddeśaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:18: tatra yaugikaṃ kathāśabdamupādāyānavasaradusthatayā bhāṣyam ākṣipya vārttikena samādhatte---tadayuktamityādinā
GSP29nvtp1_2u:19: nāyaṃ kathāśabdo yogamātrānurodhī, api tu satyeva tasmin rūḍhiniyata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:21: nanu pūrvapakṣottarapakṣabalābalanirūpaṇaṃ vicāraḥ, sa ca na kathāyā āśrayaḥ kiṃ tu viṣaya ityata āha---vicāraviṣayeti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:27: te dve api tisra eveti niyamayatā nirākṛte /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:29: na hi prathamasādhananivṛttāveva tattvanirṇayaḥ, niḥsādhanasya tasyānupapatteḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:32: yadi tu pratipakṣasādhanamanirūpyaiva vijigīṣuvitaṇḍāvat tāvataiva vādinau
GSP29nvtp1_2u:35: na ca vijayatattvanirṇayābhyāṃ phalāntaramavaśiṣyate kathāyāḥ, yadarthaṃ vādavitaṇḍā /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:36: anutpannasya hi tattvanirṇayasyotpādanam, utpannasya pālanam, pālitasya ca viniyogaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:39: nanvetāvatāpi na sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ vibhāvitamityata āha---tathā ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:41: etena vākyasaṃdṛbdhirmahāvākyamuktaṃ syāt, mithaḥ karmatayā sākāṅkṣatvāt,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:45: tathā ca svasthaḥ sarvañjanapratyayānapalāpī matamātrāvalambī avahito
GSP29nvtp1_2u:50: te 'pi prakṛtoktiko 'vipralambhako yathākālasphūrtikaḥ anākṣepako yuktisiddhasaṃpratyayī ceti pañca vāde upādeyāḥ viparyayeṇa heyāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:51: evaṃ bhūtāśca viṣyādaya eva prāyeṇeti ta evoktāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:52: evaṃ ca sati heyān vihāya yo yathābhūtaḥ sa tathābhūtena vaktumarhati /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:54: na hi yuyutsuriraṃsū pratipadya ciraṃ asiddhaṃ saṃbhūya samīhitaṃ sādhayataḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:64: sādhane ca tarkasya pramāṇāpekṣā, upālambhe tu kevalo 'pi samarthaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:67: tadgatākṣepastu uddeśa eva pramāṇatarkaśabdasya sādhanopālambhaśabdavat svavācakalakṣaṇayā vā, śabdāvāntaravyāpāratayā vā śabdapratipāditatayā vā samarthitaprāyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:70: na ca acetano 'parādhyati, nāpi pratipādyate, kiṃ puruṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:75: iyāṃstu viśeṣaḥ, yat karmatvadaśāyāṃ śabdāderanityatvaṃ dharmo karmakaraṇayorapi karmaiva
GSP29nvtp1_2u:76: iyāṃstu viśeṣaḥ, yat karmatvadaśāyāṃ śabdāderanityatvaṃ dharmo
GSP29nvtp1_2u:79: anyathā tu viṣayaḥ śaktiviṣayaḥ śakyaṃ kāryamiti yāvadityevamapi sugamametat /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:80: atra hi jalpe nigrahasthānaviniyogādityādibhāṣye na hiṃsyāt sarvabhūtāni /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:81: itivad vāde sarvanigrahasthānapratiṣedhe agnīṣomīyaṃ paśumālabheta itivat siddhāntāviruddha ityādiviśeṣavidhirityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:83_0: vārtikakārastu rāgataḥ sarvapañcanakhabhakṣaṇaprāptivat upālambhagrahaṇāt sarvanigrahasthānaprāptau pañca pañcanakhā bhakṣyāḥ
GSP29nvtp1_2u:87: na cātrāpratibhādi pākṣikam, upālambhapadena nirāśaṅkameva pratipāditatvāt
GSP29nvtp1_2u:89: ayamarthaḥ, yadyapi vidhiratyantamaprāptau niyamaḥ pākṣike sati /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:90: tatra cānyatra ca prāptau parisaṃkhyeti kīrtyate //
GSP29nvtp1_2u:91: iti bhedo darśitaḥ, tathāpyalpīyānayamiti manyamānena parisaṃkhyāyāmapi
GSP29nvtp1_2u:95: kiñcit saṃbhavadapyanudbhāvyameva yathā, pratijñāntaraṃ hetvantaramajñānamapratibhā vikṣepo matānujñā paryanuyojyopekṣaṇamiti saptakam /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:96: kiñcit tūdbhāvyamātraṃ yathā, virodho 'prāptakālaṃ nyūnamadhikaṃ punaruktamayathānubhāṣaṇamapasiddhānta iti saptakam /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:97: kiñcicca kathāvasānikaṃ yathā, hetvābhāso niranuyojyānuyogaśceti dvayamiti
GSP29nvtp1_2u:103: hetvābhāsānudbhāvane niranuyojyānuyogānudbhāvane ca pāramparyavyāghāto vyāsaṅgādīnā tatsāmagrīpratirodhaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_2u:104: tatrādhikānudbhāvane prathamo yadi na syāt, tathāpi dvitīyaḥ syādeva /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:113: apasiddhānte saṃmukhapramāṇabādhākrāntiriti ākāṅkṣāyogyatāsattimattayā pratisaṃhitaṃ pramāṇāntarāpratihataṃ ca vākyaṃ tattvapratipatteraṅgam,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:116: tadetat sarvamabhiprāyaṃ niyamayataḥ sūtrakārasya saṃmataṃ sūtrādeva ca labhyate /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:117: vārttikakṛtā tu nyūnādicatuṣṭayamudāharaṇārthaṃ darśitam, na tu niyamaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_2u:128: stheyānāṃ tu vādasthānakathāviśeṣavyavasthāpanaṃ pūrvottaravādasthāpanaṃ vivadamānayorguṇadoṣāvadhāraṇaṃ bhagnaprativādiprabodhanaṃ loke niṣpannakathāphalapratipādanaṃ ca karmāṇi /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:129: etadarthaṃ ca tatra prāśnikopayogo yad vādinau kāraṇagraheṇa evaṃ kartumaśaktau /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:131: tatra tayoreva vītarāgatayā śaktatvādityāśayavānāha---na vāde prāśnikānāmiti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:132: tat kiṃ parivarjanameva tatra teṣām? netyāha---daivāgatānāṃ tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:139: tathā hi yadi pūrvasādhanaṃ dūṣitam, nigṛhītastarhi vādī, jitaṃ dvitīyena /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:141: na dūṣitaṃ cet---uttarābhāsavacanena cāvacanena ca nigṛhītastarhi dvitīyo,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:142: jitaṃ prathamena, nivṛttā katheti nāsti dvitīyasādhanāvasara iti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:144: yathā hi vāde svasādhanasthitau parasādhananivṛttau ca tattvanirṇayo na viparyaye, tathā jalpe 'pi svasādhanasthitau parasādhananivṛttau ca vijayo viparyaye bhaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:146_0: tadayaṃ jalprapavṛttikramaḥ vādini sādhanamātraṃ prayujya saṃkṣepato vistarato vā ābhāsān uddhṛtya virate sati ucyamānagrāhyanigrahāprāptau
GSP29nvtp1_2u:146_1: ābhāsabahiruktagrāhyanigrahālābhe tadvacanārthamavagamyānūdya dūṣayitvā prativādīsvapakṣe sthāpanāṃ prayuñjīta /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:149: tasminnapyevaṃ virate sati anuktocyamānagrāhyanigrahālābhe tadvavacanamavagamyānūdya dūṣaṇāṅgaṃ prati dūṣyābhāsabahiruktagrāhyanigrahālābheda prathamavādī sthāpanāṃśaṃ dūṣayet /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:153: śarasandhānasamaya eva yo mūrcchitaḥ tadvāṇavāraṇatatpraharaṇānuṣṭhānavad viphalatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:160_0: yadyapi nigrahasthānapadenāviśeṣāt sarvaprāptau siddhāntāviruddhaḥ pañcāvayavopapanna iti padadvayātideśo mandaḥ, tathāpi
GSP29nvtp1_2u:160_1: gorbalīvardanyāyenāpi yathāśrutabhāṣyopapattau kṛtaṃ tadbhāṅgeneti manyamāno bhāṣyaṃ vārttikena samañjasayannāha---uktamātramityādi /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:167: pareṇa sādhusādhanopādāne ca kṛta ityapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:168: nanu bhāṣyaṃ dūṣayitvā kimadhikamamihitam? tenāpi tattvarakṣaṇārthatvapratipādanādityata āha---tadanena prakāreṇeti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:169: prakāre bhāṣyam asaṃgatam, na tu prayojane /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:175: tathātve vā kṛtaṃ jalpena prayāsabahulena, antataḥ satpratipakṣatayāpi dvitīyasādhanapraveśāt
GSP29nvtp1_2u:182: kathamayaṃ viśeṣa iti cet? vādinorabhiprāyavaśādanuvidheyastheyānurodhāt veti na kiñcidetat dvitīyasādhanapraveśasatu dūṣaṇatayā na pratiṣidhyate /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:186: na caivamastviti vācyam, jalpe 'pi parapakṣāghātasya gatatvenātivyāpakatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:187: mātragrahaṇāt tu tannivṛttiriti cet---na, tena sādhanānivṛtteḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:194: tatra sādhanavādinā prathamatastadābhāsaparihāre dūṣaṇavādināpi saduttaraparigrahe yatnavatā bhavitavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:195: saduttarālābhe hi asaduttarāvatāra iti śikṣārthaṃ hetvābhāsāḥ prathamaṃ chalādibhya uddiṣṭā iti saiva saṃgatirihāpītyāha---uddeśeti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:196_0: atra triṣoḍaśyāṃ vyāpakāvyāpakabhedena yā dviṣoḍaśī sā asiddhaviśeṣaṇāsiddhaviśeṣyā samarthaviśeṣaṇā samarthaviśeṣyasandigdhaviśeṣaṇasandigdhaviśeṣyabhedena
GSP29nvtp1_2u:196_1: vivakṣitā dvānavataṃ śataṃ bhavatīti saivāsiddhisandehayorvādiprativādisaṃbandhādaṣṭāviṃśataṃ śataṃ bhavet /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:205: atraiva punarāśrayāsiddhiṃ prakṣipyāparaṃ dvānavataṃ śatam iti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:212: yasya hyavasaro nāsti, tasyārthakriyā prati vicārataḥ sattvaṃ nāstīti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:214: yastu svayameva nāsti, tasya deśakālāvasthāvirodhasāmarthānāṃ nāvakāśaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:218: yastvevaṃ tasya kutaḥ sāmarthyam? prāyaḥprayogastu savyabhicāraḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:220: yad vā sugrahaḥ savyabhicāraḥ, vicchedamātrasiddhau tatsiddheḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:224: durgraho 'siddhaḥ, asiddhāśrayo 'pi kaścit heturiti paramatanirākaraṇāvaṣṭambhena tatsiddheḥ
GSP29nvtp1_2u:225: durgrahataraḥ kālātyayāpadiṣṭaḥ, bādhakasyānanyathāsiddhyā prāmāṇyaṃ vyavasthāpya tatsiddheriti
GSP29nvtp1_2u:228: nanu vibhāgasūtre savyabhicāra ityuddiṣṭaṃ padamiha māṣyakāro lakṣaṇatvenaiva vyācaṣṭe /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:229: evaṃ coddiṣṭaṃ na lakṣitam, lakṣitaṃ ca noddiṣṭamityata āha---atra ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:230: tathāpi lakṣaṇe vaktavye padaniruktiḥ kvopayujyate ityata āha---etaduktaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_2u:232: kiṃ tvekasminnante yo niyata iti anvayato vyatirekato vā sādhyenaiva sahacarito dṛṣṭa ityarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_2u:241: nanvetāvataiva sarvaṃ vyākhyātam, tat kimaparamavaśiṣyate yadarthaṃ sarvo
GSP29nvtp1_2u:246: athāyamarthaḥ, na tatrāyamanvayato vyatirekato vā niyata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:252: tadayaṃ vārttikārthaḥ, kaścid dharmaḥ sarvasyaprameyatvādilakṣaṇaḥ, kaścit kasyacideva nityatvādilakṣaṇaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_2u:253: tatra sarvasya vā kasyacid vā yo dharmo hetutayopātta ubhāvantau sādhyadharmatadviparyayau āśritya prasajya pravartate dharmiṇi so
GSP29nvtp1_2u:256: vyatirekiṇyeva hi dharme sādhye 'naikāntikaḥ saṃbhavatprayogo na tvavyatirekiṇi /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:258: tat kathaṃ tatpratiṣedha ityata āha---paryudāsapakṣa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:260: na hi goghaṭādāvabrāhmaṇa iti vaktāro bhavanti, api tu kṣatriyādāvityāha---na punarityādi subodham //5 //
GSP29nvtp1_2u:268: tayoḥ satorayaṃ vā mīmāṃsakābhimato viśeṣavirodho 'pi viruddha syādityapi /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:270: siddhāntaśabdenātra pakṣo vivakṣito 'to na prakṛtahānaṃ nāpyapasiddhāntavaiyarthyamityarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_2u:272: abhyupetya ityanena pratijñāyeti vivakṣitam, na tvabhipretyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:273: na ca viśeṣaḥ pratijñāyate 'pi tu abhipreyate na ca tathābhūtena virodhopalambhasaṃbhavo 'siddhidaśāyāmanupambhena siddhidaśāyāṃ sahopalambhenānavasaraparāhatatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:275: svārthānumānasamaye prakṛtopapādakatayā tatsiddheḥ anupapādakastu viśeṣo na sidhyati /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:277: tadāpi kathaṃ sarvathānupalabdhacaraḥ sidhyatītyapi na vācyam,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:282: syādetat, virodhe hi heturna syāt sādhya vā /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:285: kvedānīṃ viruddhaḥ? anyatarāniścaye 'pi sandigdhāsiddha ityāśakṅkyoktaṃ vārttikakṛtā yasmādamyupagataṃ bādhata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:287: nāpi kālātītaḥ, pramāṇāntareṇa balavatā abādhanāt, kiṃ tvayameva sisādhayipitaṃ bādhata iti vārttikārthaḥ sugama eva /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:289: tadapi yadyapi pratijñārthena tadbādhane 'siddhaḥ syāt, tathāpi virodhasyaiva yatrodbhaṭatvam, tatra tadullaṅghanena prayatnasādhyamasiddhatvaṃ nodbhāvyameva, daivatastatpratīkāre
GSP29nvtp1_2u:303: sa ca vidhisādhane svabhāvānupalabdhirvyāpakānupalabdhirvyāpakaviruddhopalabdhiriti trividhaḥ tadyathā dhūmavānayaṃ yogyasya satastadvattayā anupalabhyamānatvāt,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:312: iha khalu hetvābhāsānāṃ tattyānusaṃhitānāṃ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ saṃśayo vivakṣitaviparītajñānaṃ jijñāsā ajñānaṃ vyāptibādhaśceti phalāni /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:315: yasmāt prakriyamāṇārthajijñāsāmātraṃ bhavati sa prakarasama iti saṃkṣepaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_2u:316: tathāhi, pakṣe samabalabādhakasahapravṛtterna tattvanirṇayaḥ, pratibalena pratiruddhatvāt
GSP29nvtp1_2u:322: tasmādekāṃ koṭimupanayan samabalena pratiruddhaḥ kathamatra nirṇayo bhavatviti jijñāsāṃ janayan prakaraṇasama itarebhyo bhidyata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:328: yadyapi jijñāsāmātramatropayoti, tathāpi saṃśayānuvṛttinivṛttyoḥ jijñāsānuvṛttinivṛttī iti mattvoktam---tatra sandigdhe tadvā jijñāsate iti
GSP29nvtp1_2u:329: nanu yata eva jijñāsā kathaṃ tameva prekṣāvān tattvanirṇayāya prayokṣyata ityata āha---vicitrābhisandhitayeti
GSP29nvtp1_2u:330: pūrvasamayo duṣpratyayo jātu prayojyabuddhiriti hi sādhanottarābhāsaprayoge hetava ityarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_2u:332: nanu vyutpattimāśritya cet prakaraṇasamapadaṃ pravartate kṛtaṃ tarhi yasmādityādilakṣaṇāntareṇetyata āha---vyutpattīti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:333: athaitadeva pravṛttinimittaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha---anyatheti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:334: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa savyabhicārāt prakaraṇasamaṃ bhedayatā tasya saṃśayahetutvamasya ca prakaraṇapravṛttihetutvamuktam
GSP29nvtp1_2u:335: tacca saṃmugdham, pakṣapratipakṣau prakaraṇam iti prāgvyākhyānāt,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:337: na hi yasmāt prakaraṇamiti sūtramapi tu yasmāt prakaraṇacinteti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:342: nanu nityadharmānupalabdhiḥ kādācitkī vivakṣitā, sadātanī vā? ādyā
GSP29nvtp1_2u:345: na hi nityadharmopalabdhyā śabde kadācidapi na bhavitavyam iti pramāṇamasti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:346: tathā cāsiddhatvaṃ vihāya kutaḥ prakaraṇasamatvamudbhāvayatītyata āha---na
GSP29nvtp1_2u:348: ayamarthaḥ, yasyaivaṃ viśeṣagrahaḥ, tasya tāvadasiddha evāyamityastu,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:349: yastūpalambhābhāvena sulabhāmanupalabdhiṃ matvā viśeṣamapratisandhāya pratibalena ca pratibandhamupanyasyati, taṃ prati kimayamābhāsatāṃ yātu na vā? na tāvanna yāti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:353: na ca tadānīṃ doṣāntaramatra parisphurati, anyatra pratibalena pratibandhāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:354: yatrāpi yugapadanekadoṣaparisphuraṇam, tatrāpi satpratipakṣatvam apyudbhāvya viramyate
GSP29nvtp1_2u:355: na hi yāvadasti tāvadudbhāvyam, anyatra saṃbhūya pratijñāyāṃ
GSP29nvtp1_2u:357: yadyapi pratyakṣavat tattvānupalabdhirapi na kevalā, api tu samānadharmadarśanādisahitaiva saṃśayakāraṇam /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:358: tathā ca codyacuñcorabhimatabhraṃsaḥ, tathāpi tamupekṣya svasiddhāntāvarodhena pariharati---na hyakāraṇānāmiti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:360: ekasmin pakṣe ubhayapadaṃ vihāyāparasmin vyāvṛttidvāreti padamadhyāhṛtya
GSP29nvtp1_2u:363: evaṃ jijñāsāhetutvābhāvāt prakaraṇasamalakṣaṇāyogitayā śarīrādanyatvaṃ na tadudāharaṇamityuktam
GSP29nvtp1_2u:366: kecit tu manyante, tattvānupalabdhireva paraṃ prakaraṇasamo
GSP29nvtp1_2u:368: nāgṛhyamāṇaviśeṣadaśāyāmanupalabdhyoranyayorvā dharmayoḥ kaścit viśeṣo gṛhyamāṇaviśeṣadaśāyāṃ tu yathānyasyānyatra hetvābhāse 'ntarbhāvaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_2u:372: ekasyāsiddhatve vā kathamagṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatvamātyantikamubhayorapi vāstavyāmasiddhau punarubhayānubhayātmakatvaprasaṅgāditi sādhyāviśiṣṭaḥ sādhyatvātsādhyasamaḥ // 7 //
GSP29nvtp1_2u:380: asiddha ityasyāpi pakṣadharmatayā na niścita ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:388: eteṣāṃ cāniścayaḥ sandehād vā, abhāvaniścayād veti na kaścit phalaṃ prati
GSP29nvtp1_2u:390: etena vyomapadmāṃ sugandhi padmātvāt ityādayo 'pi saṃgṛhītā bhavanti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:392: yathā hi, asati sapakṣe vipakṣe ca pratiṣedhaḥ kartu na śakyate, tathā pakṣe 'pīti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:395: tadasiddhamiti cet---na, kadācidupalambhalakṣaṇenāpi anityatvena sādhyasiddheḥ teṣāṃ vyañjakavaicitrye
GSP29nvtp1_2u:399: tejasābhibhūtatvāt na tatheti cet---na, āśrayānabhibhave teṣāmanabhibhāvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:404: svāśrayaṃ prāgdeśād vibhajya deśāntaraṃ prāpayat karma tattāyāṃ vyavatiṣṭhate /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:409: dravyāsamavetaṃ hyadravyasamavetaṃ vā, asamavetameva vā syāt? ubhayathāpi guṇave vyāghātaḥ, sāmānyavataḥ svatantrasya dravyatvāpatteḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:412: guṇakarmaṇāṃ nirguṇatayā guṇasya tatra samavāyavirodhena tatsamavāye sāmānyarūpatvopapatterityarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_2u:414: hetuṃ sādhayati---na mana iti teṣāṃ viśeṣaguṇavirahāt sāmānyaguṇo 'yaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_2u:422: tacca rūpitvaṃ gaganapavanābhyāṃ vyāvartamānaṃ cākṣuṣaguṇasaṃbandhamapi vyāvartayatītyarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_2u:423_0: nāpi tejasaḥ tadguṇatvaṃ hi pratītau tadavirodhitvena vyāptam, anyathā guṇinaḥ svaguṇapratītiparipanthitve guṇasya nityānupalambhaprasaṅgāt,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:423_1: sati samavāye upalambhavirodhāt, asati samavāye cāsattvāt taccāto nivartamānaṃ tadguṇatvamapi nivartayatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:425: ayamarthaḥ, na tāvat chāyā tejaso rūpametadrūpasya śuklabhāsvaratvaniyamātṛ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:428: tathā ca cakṣuṣopalabhyamānaṃ na rūpamanantarbhāvyopalabdhuṃ śakyate,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:439: na ca yatsahitasya yasya yatra sāmarthyaṃ tadrahitena tena tatkaraṇam /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:442_0: etena pārthivaṃ rūpamāropitaṃ tama iti nirastam, bāhyālokasahakārivirahe cakṣuṣastathārope 'pyasāmarthyāt tadeva hi dharmyantare
GSP29nvtp1_2u:442_1: vā samāropyeta pittapītimavat, tatraiva vā niyatadeśe 'vagamyamāne aniyatadeśatvamiti nedīyasyaṇīyasyapi mahattvavat /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:464: sa ca niṣedhyādanekadravyānnivartamānā svavyāpyaṃ sparśarahitatvaṃ gṛhītvā tadviparīte viśrāmyatītyarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_2u:469: yat tūktam, manasā dravyāntarānārambhe vaiyarthyamupādhiḥ, na
GSP29nvtp1_2u:470: punarasparśatvam, tat kiṃ vaiyarthyādanārambhakatvamunnīyate, anārambhakād vā vaiyarthyamiti? na tāvadādyaḥ, sarvotpattimatprayojanasyāsmadādibhiḥ piśitalocanairanākalanāt /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:471: tasmād yadyārambhakasvabhāvatvaṃ manasastadā kadācidārambhe prayojanamapi kiñcid bhaviṣyatīti
GSP29nvtp1_2u:475: pratyakṣabādhastu tadā syāt yadi tama evāpahnūyeta /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:480: evaṃ tarhi raktādivyavahāro 'pi prasajyata iti cet---na, vyavahāre hi sati
GSP29nvtp1_2u:482: na tu nimittāmastītyeva vyavahāraḥ yathā śaṣayoḥ śavyavahāro gauḍānāṃ varṇatvanimittāviśeṣe 'pi na kādivyavahāraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:484: tat kiṃ na kiñcidevac chāyetyata āha---tasmād bhābhāva evac chāyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:485: na ca vācyam, so 'pi kathamālokamantareṇa pratiyogismaraṇādhikaraṇagrahaṇavirahe vidhimukhena cākṣuṣo viṣaya iti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:488: tadihāpyālokābhāve tadālokāpekṣā syāt, yadyāloke 'pi tadapekṣā bhavet /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:490: pratyuta virodha eva tasmin sati hi tadabhāva eva na syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:491: kiṃ tatsāpekṣeṇa cakṣuṣā gṛhyeta divā ca pratiyoginaḥ prabhāmaṇḍalasya grahe eva pradeśāntare tadgrahaṇamiti na kiñcidanupapannam /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:498: adhikaraṇam api dṛṣṭamanumitaṃ smṛtaṃ vā ihedānīmandhakāra iti pratyayāt /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:500: na hi nāprayogamātreṇa vidhitvam, pralayavināśāvasthānādiṣu vyabhicārāt /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:501: nārthāntarbhāvena vākyārthe padaprayogādadoṣa iti cet? ihāpi mātsaryamapanīya eṣaiva rītiranugamyatāmiti
GSP29nvtp1_2u:504: na tu deśāntaradarśanaprayuktam tacca prayojakamiha niścitavyāvṛtti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:505: tathā hi svātantrayeṇa deśāntaraprāptau vārakānuvidhānaniyamo na syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:506: prabhātulyatve tejaḥprabhāśrayeṣu ratnaviśeṣeṣuc chāyā divase na syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:507: chāyayaivābhibhave vā bahalatame tamasi teṣāmāloko na syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:515: hetutvāsiddhiḥ, na hyasti saṃbhavaḥ svabhāvapratibaddhaśca savyabhicārādiśceti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:516: tathāpi na tāvat svarūpata āśrayato vā tatrāsiddhirudbhāvayituṃ śakyate,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:518: nāpyupādhita upādhyapekṣayā vyabhicārāderlaghupratipattikatvāt, upādhestu taddvāraiva pratipatteḥ
GSP29nvtp1_2u:519: yadi ca tena dūṣayituṃ na śakyate taddvārāpyapādhirevodbhāvyeta /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:522: upādhau tu kadācid vipratipadyate, tasya durūhatvāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:523: astu tarhi savyabhicāravat aprayojako nāma ṣaṣṭho hetvābhāsaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:529: tasmād viśeṣāntarābhāvāt, sādhyasamasamānalakṣaṇavattvācca tatraiva tasyāntarbhāva ityarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_2u:531: vārttike satī chāyā gatimatī deśāntare darśanāditi viśeṣaṇadvārā āśrayāsiddhaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:533: tadetāvanta evāsiddhabhedā iti bhramanirāsārthamudāharati---ta eta iti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:539: atra yathāśrutabhāṣyavārttikadarśanāt sarvamasamañjasamiti mattvā svavyākhyāṃ sthānāntarīyabhāṣyādyupanyāsena saṃvadannāha---atretyādinā /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:555: atha virodhasyaiva prathamaṃ buddhāvupanipātāt tadudbhāvanamantareṇa pakṣadharmatvasyodbhāvayitumaśakyatvācca so 'vaśyābhyupagantavyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:558: atha yadyayamartho bhāṣyakārasya vivakṣitaḥ, kimiti naitadanurūpamudāharaṇamityata āha---atra ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:570: atha sādhanavādī pramādī prativādī vā saduttarasamādhānayoraparisphūrtau tayorvijigīṣuḥ tadābhāsamapi brūyāditi tadābhāsavyutpādanāvasaraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:571: tatrāpi jāteḥ svapakṣavyāghātāpādakatvena jaghanyatvāt chalasya tu tātparyato duṣṭatve 'pi vacanato 'duṣṭattvādasphūrtidaśāyāmapi tadeva prayoktavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:572: tasyāpyasphūrtau jātiriti viśeṣajñāpanārthaṃ jāteḥ pūrvaṃ chaloddeśaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:577: iha vāgvṛttiviparyāsena pratyavasthānaṃ na tu tatreti bheda ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:578: nanu vibhāgo nodāhṛtaḥ tatkathaṃ vibhāge tūdāharaṇānīti bhāṣyamityata
GSP29nvtp1_2u:581: yadyevaṃ kathaṃ vibhāgaśceti kṛtvā vibhāgasūtrameva paṭhatītyata
GSP29nvtp1_2u:585: pariśuddhiḥ abhidhāvṛttisaṃcāro yatrac chale tadvākchalamiti lakṣaṇārthaḥ, vācīti
GSP29nvtp1_2u:589: tadyathā bhūbhṛdayaṃ vīryaśālī mahāvayavattvādityatra dharmipadasaṃcāreṇa na nakhaprasūnāñcitakarapallavo 'yaṃ nityakarmakaratvādityatra sādhyapadasaṃcāreṇa /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:602: tad yathā, anyathāsiddho 'siddhaśceti vyāghātaḥ kathamapi siddhatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:606_0: asya pratyavasthānamityādi bhāṣyaṃ na pūrvasūtravyākhyānaṃ nottarasūtraparaṃ vetyata āha---tadetacchalamiti sambhavator'thasyātisāmānyayogādasambhūtārthakalpanā
GSP29nvtp1_2u:613: kvacit tu hetutvoddeśaviśeṣaṇeṣu yathā brāhmaṇādupajāto 'yaṃ brāhmaṇatvāt
GSP29nvtp1_2u:615: tadetat sarvaṃ vivakṣitamāpnoti cātyeti cobhayasamānaṃ cetyatisāmānyamucyate /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:619: dvitīyaṃ tu, anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvādityukte dhaṭo 'pyanityaḥ tarhi kṛtakatvāt śabdaḥ syāt
GSP29nvtp1_2u:620: tṛtīyaṃ tu, śataṃ dvijātayo bhojitā ityukte śatasaṃkhyāvacchinnā api
GSP29nvtp1_2u:622: caturthaṃ tu, brāhmaṇājjāto 'yaṃ brāhmaṇatvādityukte saṃbhāvanāviṣayo 'yamabhihito na heturiti
GSP29nvtp1_2u:623: pañcamaṃ tu, anityaṃ kāryamanityatvādityukte sādhyāviśiṣṭo heturiti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:624: ṣaṣṭhaṃ tu, dvijaśataṃ bhojitamityukte dvijā bhojitāḥ, na tu tadmatā
GSP29nvtp1_2u:631: tad yathā, ayaṃ māṇavakaḥ siṃhaḥ, ayaṃ siṃho rājñaḥ, ayaṃ puruṣasiṃho rājaśārdūlasyeti pratijñāmāritya trayam /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:632: varṣāṣu nausaṃcāryeyaṃ bhūmirgaṅgātvāt, ghoṣāṇāṃ sukhavasatihetavaste deśā
GSP29nvtp1_2u:633: gaṅgātvāt, sa pradeśo dhanakāśādivano gaṅgātvāditi hetumāśrityatrayam /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:634: ye dhvanihetavaste krośanti yathā mañcāḥ, ye krośanti te dhvanihetavo yathā mañcāḥ, ye krośanaprayojanavantaste krośanti yathā mañcāḥ, iti dṛṣṭāntamāśritya trayam /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:639: na ca heturasiddhatvādīnā dūṣyate api tu liṅgameva /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:640_0: ato niranuyojyānuyogo bhavata ityādi dharmavikalpanirdeśaśabdenābhidhānadharmo dvedhābhidhīyata iti vārttikaikavākyatām āpādayituṃ
GSP29nvtp1_2u:641: dyayapi neha sphuṭam tathāpyekatra vastusadbhāvaḥ pratiṣidhyate /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:646: saṃgatirhi dvedhā bhavavati, antarbhāvalakṣaṇā ānantaryalakṣaṇā ca /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:647: tatra na tāvat pūrvā chalaparīkṣāsūtrāṇāṃ lakṣaṇasyādhyāyārthatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:649: nāpyuttarā ṣoḍhāpyatra saṃbhāvyate, smārakābhāvena prasaṅgābhāvāt, tayā vinaiva prakṛtasiddheḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:651: uttaratrāvyavahāreṇānirvāhakatvāt, chalaparīkṣājātyādilakṣaṇasūtrāṇāṃ prakṛtopayogyekakāryāyogena tannibandhanāya api saṃgaterabhāvādityata āha---parīkṣāparvaṇa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:655: parīkṣitaṃ satsu vivacitaṃ sugrahaṃ supariharaṃ chalaṃ bhaviṣyatīti parīkṣāprayojanaṃ sphuṭīkṛtya pūrvapakṣamāha---yathā hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:664: vārttikaṃ tu ekatra dharmaḥ pratiṣidhyate 'nyatra dharmīti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:666: na hyatra mañcā eva dharmiṇaḥ pratiṣidhyante /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:671: sarvavyāpakaṃ tu mukhyopacāravṛttyanugatatvena anayorbhedakau niyatau dharmāviti // 1.6 //
GSP29nvtp1_2u:678_0: yadyapyasaduttaratayā jāteḥ chalaprakaraṇa evāntarbhāvo yuktaḥ, tathāpi pratijñāhānyādernigrahasthānasyāpi tathābhāvāt tāṃ
GSP29nvtp1_2u:678_1: saṃgatimupekṣyārthadūṣaṇatvābhiprāyeṇa prayogasya sāmyāduttaraprakaraṇa evāntarbhāvaḥ tatrāntarbhūtāyāśca jāteḥ pṛthakkaraṇe
GSP29nvtp1_2u:682: chalasya samyagdūṣaṇasya ca ityupalakṣaṇam, pratijñāhānyāderityapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:683: na ca chale ityupalakṣaṇaṃ tathaiva, tathāpi samyagdūṣaṇasyāvyudāsaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:684: tasyāpi hetuto vaidharmyeṇa hetvābhāsasādharmyeṇa pratyavasthānarūpatvādityata āha---na ceti
GSP29nvtp1_2u:685: ayaṃ ca mātraśabdārtho jātīnāmavatāraṃ vāde pratiṣedhatā asaduttaratvakhyāpanenaiva sūtrakṛtā sūcitaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:693: aparāddho hi nigrahaṃ śāstiṃ khalīkāraṃ prāpnoti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:700: tena kathāyāṃ pravṛttayāṃ vādinoratattvajñānajñāpikā kriyā nigrahasthānamiti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:706: kathamasau svarūpato 'pratīyamānaiva sattāmātreṇa nigrahasthānaṃ bhaviṣyati? na hyapratītameva paradāradharṣaṇaṃ nigrahāya paryāptamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:708: yato vipratipadyamānaḥ prāptaparājayo bhavati, ataḥ parājayaprāptidvāreṇa unnetuṃ śakyate
GSP29nvtp1_2u:709: atha parājayaprāptireva kā ityata uktam---nigrahasthānaṃ pratijñāhānyādi khalu spaṣṭam parājayaprāptiriti bhāṣyaṃ sphuṭamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:711: nigrahasthānatvānupapatteḥ, tathāpi vipratipannavastugocaratvena na tu tatreti tadanigrahasthānatvabhramanivāraṇārthamasamāsakaraṇamityarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_2u:715_0: yathoddeśamiti---yathoddeśakramaṃ bhavatu lakṣaṇam, na tu lakṣaṇakramānatikrameṇa parīkṣā bhaviṣyati, prathamata eva vyatikramādityata
GSP29nvtp1_2u:717: ārthyā vṛttyā prathamasūtrasya uddeśāntarbhāve 'pi dvitīyasūtramalagnakam asaṃgatikatvādityata āha---tasmāditi /
